Package au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAccessAction
    Interface for a master user session access and revocation action.
    IAction
    Action interface used for type safety.
    IActivityDetectorAction
    Interface for detecting activity on a rig.
    INotifyAction
    Interface for a user notification method.
    IResetAction
    Interface for an action to reset a device.
    IRig
    Rig interface.
    IRigControl
    Interface for rig client control.
    IRigExerciser
    Interface for rig exerciser / monitoring operations.
    IRigSession
    Interface for rig session operations.
    ISlaveAccessAction
    Interface for a slave user session action assignment and revocation.
    ITestAction
    Interface for an exerciser test.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractControlledRig
    Abstract rig type class for rigs which provide direct control of the rig using the rig client.
    AbstractRig
    Abstract rig type class that contains lists of the following actions: IAcessAction ISlaveAccessAction IResetAction INotifyAction ITestActionM IActivityDetectorAction When a method is called, the corresponding action list is iterated through and the action initiating method is called.
    ConfiguredControlledRig
    An controlled rig that uses a configured batch runner (i.e.
    ConfiguredRig
    Rig type which loads action classes from configuration.
    IRigControl.BatchResults
    Batch control invocation results.
    IRigControl.PrimitiveRequest
    Primitive control request information.
    IRigControl.PrimitiveResponse
    Primitive control response.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractRig.ActionType
    Action types that may be registered with registerAction.
    IRigControl.BatchState
    Batch control states.
    IRigSession.Session
    Specifies if that state a user may be in with respect to sessions.
